Question & Options:
Which statements are true regarding the filming locations and context of the movie 'Welcome Back'?
Options:
A. A) The song 'Tutti' was filmed in a replica of the Emirates Palace.
B. B) 'Welcome Back' was the first Bollywood film shot inside the Emirates Palace.
C. C) A significant part of 'Welcome Back' was filmed in the United Arab Emirates.
D. D) 'Welcome Back' was exclusively filmed in Mumbai.
Correct Answer: A) The song 'Tutti' was filmed in a replica of the Emirates Palace., B) 'Welcome Back' was the first Bollywood film shot inside the Emirates Palace., C) A significant part of 'Welcome Back' was filmed in the United Arab Emirates.
